scripts.build:evaluhealth-ui: pnpm --filter evaluhealth-ui build && pnpm --filter evaluhealth-ui after-build
scripts.build: pnpm run build:evaluhealth && pnpm run build:evaluhealth-ui
scripts.dev: pnpm build:evaluhealth && pnpm build:evaluhealth-ui && pnpm --filter evaluhealth --filter evaluhealth-tests --parallel run dev
scripts.test: pnpm build && pnpm --filter evaluhealth --filter evaluhealth-tests test
scripts.example: pnpm build && pnpm --filter example --filter evaluhealth-ui --filter evaluhealth --parallel dev
scripts.ci: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm --filter evaluhealth --filter evaluhealth-tests lint && pnpm check-format
